metadata.title: CVE-2019-10879 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In Teeworlds 0.7.2, there is an integer overflow in CDataFileReader::Open() in engine/shared/datafile.cpp that can lead to a buffer overflow and possibly remote code execution, because size-related multiplications are mishandled.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-10879` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

teeworlds - 0.7.2-5
teeworlds-data - 0.7.2-5
teeworlds-server - 0.7.2-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: teeworlds package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.7.2-5').
